name: A-STAR THEFT | Demo Version
description:
A-Star Theft allows the player to execute heists with a wide variety of methods. Sneak or shoot your way to the loot using specialized equipment tailored to each strategy.

This demo version enters you into Freeplay Mode, where Pillage City Bank is available for play and experimentation. Along with the map comes the full equipment store and character customization.

KEY FEATURES:

- STEALTH
The stealthy option offers you control over the situation. Make your entrance by cutting open windows, or dress up as a guard to fool your enemies. Disable cameras and subdue anyone who hears you drilling open the vault.

- VIOLENCE
Run and gun, stay behind cover, or even blow a hole in the wall for fast entry, that is up to you. Find the loot and get out as fast as possible, or you will need to face an aggressive police force head-on.

- CROWD CONTROL
Controlling civilians is a vital part of any heist. Tie them up to make sure they don't call the police, or if it's too late, use them to decrease police aggression and get a human shield. You can even kill one of them to make a statement.

- EQUIPMENT STORE
The weapons store provides you with any equipment you may need, for any strategy you choose. It ranges from high power assault rifles and explosives to silent glass cutters and cable ties.

- DYNAMIC GAMEPLAY
A-Star Theft is designed to accommodate your playstyle. The game offers a wide variety of choices and opportunities, and some strategies may not be very obvious at first.

The full version of A-Star Theft is available on Steam
